class  la_manager::LAConfiguration
 interface of LAConfiguration This class defines the configuration of LA manager More...
class  la_manager::LAManager
 Interface of LAManager LAManager generates the following three outputs: a) raw term list b) primary term list c) Secondary term list LAManager is composed of a series of processors and is pipelined as the following steps: 1) Tokenizer (necessary): split the input text into a list of tokens 2) NounFilter or POSFilter (optional): analyze the POS of words and filter out the user specified types of words, currently not available 3) StopAnalyzer (optional): remove stopword 4) StemAnalyzer (optional): stem 5) NGramAnalyzer (optional): extract the char-based ngram or word-based ngram The Tokenizer is necessary part and the analyzers(2,3,4,5) are optional. The Tokenizer ouputs a raw term list and a primary term list. The secondary term list is generated by steps: 2),3),4),5). More...
